question: This state launched the Wi-Fi project over 1,000 public places in the city.
explanation: The Telangana Government launched the 'Hyderabad City Wi-Fi' project, providing the wireless Networking Technology at over 1,000 public places in the city. The network has now been installed at 1,000 hotspots with an assured bandwidth of 5-10 Mbps offering 30 minutes of free wi-fi. Cellular Operators Association of India (COAI) is the technical adviser to the Telangana Government on the project.
